name: Unstable Stable
description:
Unstable Stable is an infinite-runner game made in Ludum Dare 49 of which the theme is "Unstable". It is created in Unreal Engine 5.

Used asset packs:

Farm Animal Pack (https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/farm-animals-pack)

Farm Animal Sounds (https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/farm-animal-sounds)

Some Quixel Assets

Team:

Anıl Kapıkıran - Unreal Engine Developer

Burak Furkan Akşahin - Unreal Engine Developer

Ezgi Katı - Sound Artist

Göktuğ Yamak - 2D/3D Artist

Mete Baykal - Unreal Engine Developer

S. Ayça Metin Akşahin - Level Designer/Illustrator

Changes made during submission hour:
-Fixed a bug caused by a procedural generation that made the game run on lower fps after playing a while.
-Fixed a bug that made the camera drift away from the character.
